explanation: [0-0] Inside a stadium, a young boy in a yellow jersey sits on a man's shoulders, watching a football match. The boy, with his face painted, focuses intently on the game. In the lower part of the screen, two football teams are playing, with spectators filling the stands.

[0-6] The yellow team in the lower part of the screen advances with the ball. After the goalkeeper deflects a shot, the ball rebounds off another yellow player who then shoots, sending the ball soaring through the air and ultimately into the net.
